column4: im not sure if this is the right place to ask this.  but i think it has a high relation to ubuntu.  im going to be developing a website, but thats aside from the point.  i want to create a search engine on my site to search within the site.  is it possible to have user input search across directories and files on my box?
no, and yes. I think there is a web development channel.
could you tell me that channel?
I have no idea. try #web, #webdev, and other similiar things.
